text: Aleksandr Nikolayevich Mikhailov ( September 15, 1951 – December 4, 2020) was a Russian politician. He was Governor of Kursk Oblast in Russia from 2000 to 2018. He was a member of the State Duma from 1993 to 2000 and of the Federation Council from 2018 until his death. Mikhailov died on December 4, 2020 at the age of 69.Скончался экс-губернатор Курской области Александр Михайлов ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Members of the State Duma Category:People from Kursk Oblast Category:Members of the Federation Council (Russia)
title: Alexander Nikolayevich Mikhailov
